name: exercise-1
description: Git Branching and Environments: Exercise 1  Your task is to create a simple NodeJS application that includes a connection to a MongoDB database  with environment-specific configurations for 3 environments (dev, release & prod) and load them  dynamically.  In this application you should have a small model with minimal services (CRUD) while following proper  git flow and branching techniques.  You will be judged based on the following:  • Cleanliness of the structure/approach applied  • Whether the application works or not  • Proper handling of git branches and git flow
